data.actual_result: The descriptions remain in your previous language, requiring you to refresh for the change to properly apply
data.expected_result: The descriptions should be in your newly chosen language
data.short_description: Chat commands description don't adapt initially after changing your client language
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your client language to something other than your currently chosen one - Go into a Server/DM and type a slash to bring up the chat commands list and observe
